NOTE: This is a note.
It's just a paragraph.

TIP: This is a tip.
It's just a paragraph.

IMPORTANT: This is an important.
It's just a paragraph.

CAUTION: This is a caution.
It's just a paragraph.

[#the_warning]
WARNING: This is a warning.
It's just a paragraph.
